title: (x) THE FACE headline face - Oeiller {Jack K}
content:
in the latest couple of THE FACE magazine they are using a font i would like to know who made and sell?!   
   
you can see it here:   
   
dirty   
   
http://face.taming-chaos.co.uk/
author: zpunktled

comments.content:
I've seen this (simmilar) type on another magazine. The unusual t derived from the 3 also picked up my interest.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/24383.jpg)
Does any typophile knows any simmilar 3/t/E fonts?
[Interfacer from T-26](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142202/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/interfacer/) is one, but it is not identical to this face.

aaaaaahhhhhhhh..   
thanx Mike Y.   
   
Yeah! it must be a T26:er   
   
how about :   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/oeiller/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142202/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/oeiller/)
That's it all right. Close, but no cigar for me.

oh yes you will... and handrolled by a Cuban virgin too!   
   
all i had to do was check Interfacer   
and then run the "find similar commando" at myfonts   
   
   
thanx again.

co-op is GREAT!   
but hey Yves... you ought to ad Mike too in the header! He made everything possible..   
i am nothing without him : )   
he set it up for me and told me where to fish!
